 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרַד‎</span>] **verb** ==escape== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***take fright, shy*** (of camel or horse), ***run away***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be terrified***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***survivor***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׂרְדוּ‎</span> [[Josh.10.20|Josh 10:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person), [[BDB#Benn|Benn]] strike out as dittograph
